category: news
title: "Artificial intelligence helps detect gait alterations and diagnose Parkinson’s disease"
excerpt: "Researchers at São Paulo State University tested machine learning techniques to estimate parameters such as step length, width and velocity. The method makes clinical diagnosis more precise and can determine the stage reached in progression of the disease."
